apps.name: AltStore Beta Installer
apps.versionDescription: Redirects requests to the BurritoSOFTWARE server.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: AltStore | Having trouble?
news.caption: Please read the FAQ for help with installing apps.

news.title: Burrito | Join Discord
news.caption: Tap here to join the BurritoSOFTWARE Discord server.

news.title: Burrito | Step 1 Successful
news.caption: Now, tap here and install the AltStore Beta! After you install the AltStore Beta, you can delete this preliminary AltStore.
